programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Commanders (3-8) and Broncos (9-2) return to the gridiron on Sunday Night Football. Denver headed into the bye on an eight-game winning run and in firm control of the AFC West. Washington's overtime loss to Miami in Madrid was its sixth in a row.

The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-school student plans a secret hookup with a female teacher, but ends up in a sinister situation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ingnue ballerina discovers she's been secretly videotaped for a pornographic website.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a role-play session on a camming website turns violent after one user decides to meet his idol in person.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU faces the fury of social media fans when they arrest two popular influencer brothers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A car accident leads the detectives on a search for an ambulance driver assaulting his charges; Fin gives Detective Bruno a tour of Manhattan SVU.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An internet dating site becomes the source of terror for a young widow; Muncy struggles with Velasco's absence.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a cellist's (Tamara Gorski) orchestra conductor (Michael Nader) after she is brutally attacked in her apartment.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman believes her young son was molested by her husband; an online pedophile site is investigated.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a female video game developer who has been receiving death threats refuses to delay the launch of her new game, the cops must work to protect her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-school student plans a secret hookup with a female teacher, but ends up in a sinister situation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Taking an active approach to catching sex offenders, the team targets a photographer with a secret life whose fantasies may have crossed into reality.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous fashion photographer accused of raping a young model asks his successful brother to help him avoid charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a teen uses a rifle to stop an assault on his mother, he learns the perpetrator of the assault is someone he knows.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin revisits his military roots to help a fellow Army Ranger who is struggling to recover from a sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation hits a nerve with Benson when a suspect claims his genetic makeup causes him to commit rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Barba ask witnesses to risk their jobs after a news anchor makes an on-air accusation of rape against her boss.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a woman claims a charismatic spiritual healer used hypnosis to incapacitate her and assault her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a crucial witness in the case of a fatal hate crime against a Muslim family is deported, Barba must drop the charges against a suspect, resulting in rising tensions between communities on either side of the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The release of a suspect in a hate crime case leaves Benson and Barba caught between two families seeking justice; as public protests escalate to violence, Benson goes to desperate lengths to make an arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an infant goes missing, members of the SVU find themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case; Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial predator targeting men in gay bars proves difficult to catch, until a celebrity comes forward with his story.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Carisi begins the long-anticipated trial of Sir Toby Moore, the SVU faces setbacks in several other cases.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the squad tries to solve an assault in Central Park, they are hampered by their own blind spots and a community that is losing trust in the police.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU questions a group of college roommates when one of them goes missing during COVID-19 lockdown.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for three women suspected of drugging and robbing wealthy men; the case leads to personal connections for both Benson and Kat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the investigation into a sex-for-housing scheme expands, Benson's loyalty to Garland is tested; Rollins and Carisi try to keep their witnesses on board when a powerful congressman is identified as a suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for a missing witness leads Fin and Kat down a dangerous path; Chief McGrath puts pressure on Garland and Benson to get a conviction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Carisi are baffled when a series of assaults have the same M.O. but different DNA at each crime scene; Muncy believes Elias Olsen has struck again and is determined to prove it.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: In the search for a revenge-for-hire crime ring, Benson and Stabler combine forces on a case that has now spread globally; Fin and Bruno help a victim assaulted a second time; Jet's plan to hack the dark web backfires and puts the team in danger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teenager found unconscious in the park leads to a missing persons investigation; Benson must help Noah come to terms with the past when he questions the origins of his birth.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous fashion photographer accused of raping a young model asks his successful brother to help him avoid charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a teen uses a rifle to stop an assault on his mother, he learns the perpetrator of the assault is someone he knows.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The murder of former NBA star and hometown hero Lorenzen Wright sends shockwaves through the city of Memphis, Tenn.; insiders speak out about new developments in the lengthy search for justice.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The murder of former NBA star and hometown hero Lorenzen Wright sends shockwaves through the city of Memphis, Tenn.; insiders speak out about new developments in the lengthy search for justice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Detective Benson faces Lewis in the courtroom, the stress causes setbacks in her recovery; Benson is forced to reveal secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a suspect is gravely injured and the case becomes a public spectacle, Amaro's badge is on the line; Cragen surprises everyone with an announcement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Rollins strikes a deal with the managers of a gambling club in order to protect her job, she ends up drawing the suspicion of Benson and Tutuola.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Three young girls' search for a mythical character leads to one of them becoming injured and the other two disappearing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After being found unconscious in her hotel bathroom, an Atlanta detective -- in town for a law-enforcement conference -- says that she was raped; Rollins discovers a personal connection to the suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is found dead, Rollins goes under cover at a high-end rehab center where the victim was last seen; Benson tries to overcome her doubts about Sheila.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate a father's murder after his teenage daughters call in a home burglary that turns into an attempted assault; when the team speaks with the medical examiner, the details don't add up.

programme.desc: Discussion and analysis of Premier League soccer.

programme.title: Live: Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: From Craven Cottage in London.

programme.title: Everything on the Menu With Braun Strowman
programme.desc: In New Orleans, Braun devours bold flavors that hit harder than a steel chair.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are spread thin when three major cases come in at midnight; Rollins and Carisi argue over an arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator; Kat disobeys the captain's orders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.
